ComicInfo.Summary:
GUEST-STARRING BRIAN MICHAEL BENDIS! Brian Michael Bendis comes to Buckaroo, Oregon looking to do research on a comic book about the ultimate serial killers! If youâ€™ve ever wanted to see BENDIS running in the dark and screaming in fear, this is the comic for you!
Note: Nailbiter #7 is an homage to one of Bendis' own comic books, Powers Vol. 1 #7 guest starring Warren Ellis. Introduced by the Police Captain as a writer of graphic novels Ellis accompanies the rather reluctant Detective Walker to do research on the process of police work.
ComicInfo.Tags: Nicolas Finch,Abigail Barker,The Whistler,Brian Michael Bendis,Shannon Crane,Nailbiter,Buckaroo,Oregon,Serial Killer Graveyard
